Author: Phil Wilson
Comment: It’s really, really good. I think you probably have to see it on the big screen before on TV, so no hitting port 6881 for it!

Author: Dan Bailey
Comment: I’m going seeing it tonight. This is the most excited I’ve been about a film for years, I really hope it doesn’t disappoint.
